item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How fast the days are getting longer (298 points | 98 comments)
2. Muons used to test the condition of a road bridge in Estonia (67 points | 10 comments)
3. AI Blindspots – Blindspots in LLMs I've noticed while AI coding (132 points | 36 comments)
4. fd: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to 'find' (418 points | 196 comments)

6. Launch HN: Modernbanc (YC W20) – Modern and fast accounting software (58 points | 58 comments)
7. The Collective Ambition Behind Odysseus, a Game-Changing Sci-Fi Larp (47 points | 16 comments)

9. Fine-tune Google's Gemma 3 (81 points | 30 comments)

14. Markprompt (YC W24) – Stripe for customer support – is hiring founding eng in SF ( | hide)

22. Control your attention on the web – Block sites on certain days and times (10 points | discuss)
23. How I got 100% off my train travel (80 points | 85 comments)

25. The clustering behavior of sliding windows (68 points | 11 comments)
26. Ikemen-GO: open-source reimplementation of MUGEN (79 points | 12 comments)

28. Learning about Innovation from Half a Century of Conway's Game of Life (82 points | 48 comments)
29. Video game workers in North America now have an industry-wide union (296 points | 114 comments)
30. Imagining the Dinosaurs: How art, science combined to bring a lost world to life (11 points | 1 comment)
